channel.title: Mapstarter on Ethan Nelson - Data Reporter
channel.description: Recent content in Mapstarter on Ethan Nelson - Data Reporter

item.title: Farm Bankruptcies in the Upper Midwest
item.description: Increasing competition from emerging economies like Brazil and Russia and decreasing prices are creating problems for Midwestern farmers. More farms filed for bankruptcy 2018 than the U.S. has seen in years. This is a map detailing that trend. It makes use of d3.js, Mapstarter, and topojson.
